entry.title: Combined summary - Forking personal "vanity" versions...
entry.summary: Alan Grimes posted a message on the Bitcoin forums in 2011 addressing those who complain about the abundance of vanity versions of Bitcoin. Another user expressed frustration at the lack of substance in Grimes' post, stating that it does not ask a question, make a statement, or serve any purpose. Additionally, Grimes mentioned a "vanity version" of Bitcoin that removes libdb usage and development headers requirement.
